## Source: amazon-inspector (c5238325d9c28808a2213c9d93413847ccb8a9989720c91a2e6f8b161947fda0)
The package libxmljs2varaboba was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (16ad9ea87f573dd90a31d14b711b01971c879f66ff957465239862bd69cf34c7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'libxmljs2varaboba' @ 0.30.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
